title: Spicy Mexican bean soup
description: This hearty, warming soup uses basic store cupboard ingredients and is cooked from scratch in the microwave. Add extra chilli powder for a spicy kick.This meal, if served as six portions, provides 94kcal, 4.5g protein, 13g carbohydrate (of which 7g sugars), 1g fat (of which 0.2g saturates), 6g fibre and 0.3g salt per portion.
ingredients: 2 medium carrots or 1 medium carrot and 1 medium sweet potato
